title: ITASC
description: Built a cloud-based note-taking application with comprehensive CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality.
Implemented robust JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication for secure user sessions and data integrity.
Designed to support secure storage and efficient retrieval for over 1,000 daily active users.

title: LOFIDORO TIMER
description: Created a dedicated timer application designed for focused work sessions, integrated with curated lo-fi music.
Achieved an impressive 80% user satisfaction rating on its intuitive UI/UX experience during initial testing.
futurePlans: Scheduled for a complete rebuild using React for improved maintainability and scalability.
Future integration with Spotify API planned to offer a wider range of music streaming options.
